title: Streptomycin
summary: Streptomycin is an antibiotic medication used to treat a number of bacterial infections,[2] including tuberculosis, Mycobacterium avium complex, endocarditis, brucellosis, Burkholderia infection, plague, tularemia, and rat bite fever.[2] For active tuberculosis it is often given together with isoniazid, rifampicin, and pyrazinamide.[3] It is administered by injection into a vein or muscle.[2]
